snippet: Dr. Zakir Naik, a prominent Muslim from India, has said that “the Jews” control America and that the United States government was responsible for the Sept. 11 attacks.
abstract: King Faisal International Prize for service to Islam, one of Saudia Arabia's highest honors, is given to Dr Zakir Naik, prominent Muslim televangelist from India who has been harsh critic of United States; move highlights Saudi Arabia's conflicted position as important American ally as well as supporter of Islamists who profess hatred of West.

byline.contributor: Suhasini Raj contributed reporting from New Delhi, and Neha Thirani Bagri from Mumbai, India.

lead_paragraph: Dr. Zakir Naik, a prominent Muslim from India, has said that “the Jews” control America and that the United States government was responsible for the Sept. 11 attacks.

headline.main: Saudi Award Goes to Muslim Televangelist Who Harshly Criticizes U.S.
headline.print_headline: Saudi Award Goes to Muslim Televangelist Who Harshly Criticizes U.S.
